name: Sigil of the New Dawn
text: Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}{W}. If you do, return that card to your hand.

editions.flavor:
"We lay our dead to rest in a beautiful bed, in hopes that the Ancestor will think it a fit cradle for the next life."
—Mystic elder

name: Sigil of Valor
text:
Whenever equipped creature attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other creature you control.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

editions.flavor: With each honor he earns, Gideon paves the path to his redemption.

name: Sigil Tracer
text: {1}{U}, Tap two untapped Wizards you control: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

editions.flavor: "The reflection is true. It is you who are distorted and false."

name: Signal Pest
text:
Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)
Signal Pest can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.

editions.flavor: It leaps from tree to tree, revealing the enemy's positions.
It leaps from tree to tree, revealing the enemy's positions.

name: Signal the Clans
text: Search your library for three creature cards and reveal them. If you reveal three cards with different names, choose one of them at random and put that card into your hand. Shuffle the rest into your library.

editions.flavor: Gruul clanfolk obey few rules, but all feel bound to answer the call of the horn.

name: Sign in Blood

editions.flavor: Nephalia is home to many hard-shelled creatures of unusual size, the largest of which are either avoided or worshipped.

name: Silence
text: Your opponents can't cast spells this turn. (Spells cast before this resolves are unaffected.)

editions.flavor:
"All the wizardry in the world has to pass through one small and easily sealed door."

"Take a quiet moment to reflect on your sins."

name: Silence the Believers

Strive — Silence the Believers costs {2}{B} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Exile any number of target creatures and all Auras attached to them.

name: Silent Arbiter
text:
No more than one creature can attack each combat.
No more than one creature can block each combat.

editions.flavor: Scholars say that arbiters exist on every world, created by an unknown hand to enforce justice.
Scholars say that arbiters exist on every world, created by an unknown hand to enforce justice.

—The Theriad

name: Silent Assassin
text: {3}{B}: Destroy target blocking creature at end of combat.

editions.flavor: She feels no need to disturb her victim's slumber.

name: Silent Attendant
text: {T}: You gain 1 life.

editions.flavor: "The answer to life should never be death; it should always be more life, wrapped tight around us like precious silks."

name: Silent-Blade Oni
text:
Ninjutsu {4}{U}{B} ({4}{U}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Whenever Silent-Blade Oni deals combat damage to a player, look at that player's hand. You may cast a nonland card in it without paying that card's mana cost.

name: Silent-Chant Zubera
text: When Silent-Chant Zubera dies, you gain 2 life for each Zubera that died this turn.

editions.flavor: When the Honden of Cleansing Fire was abandoned, its attendants swarmed Kamigawa to erode mortal will.

name: Silent Departure
text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Flashback {4}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

editions.flavor: The same magic that lets geists pass through our realm can force them out of it.
The same magic that lets geists pass through our realm can force them out of it.

name: Silent Observer
text: Flying

editions.flavor: It's not just a feeling—you are being watched.

text:
Flying

editions.flavor: It serves a justice higher than the whims of the gods.

text:

{1}{W/U}, {Q}: Tap target creature. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)

Stronger than cold steel.

Reach

name: Silkweaver Elite

Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

name: Silkwing Scout
text:
Flying
{G}, Sacrifice Silkwing Scout: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

name: Silkwrap
text: When Silkwrap enters the battlefield, exile target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less an opponent controls until Silkwrap leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)

editions.flavor: Better scarves than scars.

name: Silt Crawler
text: When Silt Crawler enters the battlefield, tap all lands you control.

editions.flavor: If they could replenish the land instead of draining it, Jamuraa would be teeming with them.

name: Silumgar Assassin
text:
Creatures with power greater than Silumgar Assassin's power can't block it.

name: Silumgar Butcher
text:
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Silumgar Butcher exploits a creature, target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Silumgar takes pride in the diversity of his sibsig.

name: Silumgar Monument
text:
{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.
{4}{U}{B}: Silumgar Monument becomes a 4/4 blue and black Dragon artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Silumgar dominates his clan from a fortress on the Marang River, where he rests upon piles of treasure.

text:

• Counter target noncreature spell.
• Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
• Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying

When Silumgar Spell-Eater is turned face up, counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}. If you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast Silumgar's Scorn, counter that spell instead.

name: Silumgar, the Drifting Death
text:
Flying, hexproof
Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, creatures defending player controls get -1/-1 until end of turn.

name: Silverclaw Griffin
text: Flying, first strike

Hunters of every species on the savannah, silvercoats disdain camouflage in favor of total dominance of the food chain.

—Ajani Goldmane

text: {T}: Draw a card and reveal it. If it isn't a land card, discard it.
